metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8929 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Memory leak in the __archive_read_get_extract function in archive_read_extract2.c in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a tar file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8929` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> introduced and fixed between 3.1.2 and 3.2.0

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1').
